articles.author: Lily Hay Newman
articles.title: Google Is Adding Passkey Support for Its Most Vulnerable Users - WIRED
articles.description: Google is bringing the password-killing “passkey” tech to its Advanced Protection Program users more than a year after rolling them out broadly.
articles.content: The password killers known as passkeys are now available to users of Google's Advanced Protection Program, which works to add an additional layer of account protection for people who fear that they c… [+1849 chars]
